title: Heinie Zimmerman Hand-Cut Printer's Scrap with Missing Color Passes $500
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Heinie Zimmerman Hand-Cut Printer's Scrap with Missing Color Passes $500
posts.post_content:
Price includes shipping and assumes a no-fee payment method.  Paypal Goods is fine as long as you add 3% ($515).  The second scan shows the scrap card alongside my Carolina Brights.  The CB is just shown for the sake of comparison, it is not included.  Both scans were taken with the same scanner and settings.  It shows the missing colors pretty well.  The red blob by his hands is pretty cool.

$500

Thanks for looking!
